cause.description:
Reef Check is an international non-profit organization working to preserve coral reefs worldwide and rocky reefs in California. It is the NGO sponsor of the International Year of the Reef and has created the International Declaration of Reef Rights to raise awareness and support for the reef crisis.
VISIT www.reefcheck.org TO SIGN THE PETITION AND LEARN MORE!!
1. Coral reef marine systems are irreplaceable and must be protected
cause.mission: Acquire 1,000,000 signatures to present to coral reef country governments
cause.name: International Declaration of Reef Rights
